author: Pi-network314159

The cases you had with your brother, sister, uncle, Father and mother and the exact date.  Sometimes I start woundering if women memory card are 1terabite that makes them to have such a retentive memory. But men they easily forget even when they had their hair cuts😂Why do dey have such a retentive memory?

comments.body: It is important to avoid generalizations based on gender, as there is great variability within each group. Some research suggests that there may be differences in how men and women approach certain types of cognitive tasks, but these differences do not necessarily imply a superiority of one gender over the other in terms of memory.
